LC-3 Simulator

Heads up!

You're using a super bleeding edge version of the LC-3 simulator. If you're looking for a version that might actually work, please visit the stable version.

Please feel free to report bugs about the stable version to its GitHub repository here! It's probably not worth it to report bugs about this version, though.

I'll release this version, which is much better, once it reaches feature parity. Bear with me! — WC
